TopicTitle: Looking for tools and mods to make a machinima

Articles.Content: I am planning on making a machinima but I am wanting to have and use the proper tools that come along with it so before I do that I am wondering if you guys can point out useful mods I can use for this as well as historical mods eg. Sputnik, Apollo, etc. and how to get them all to work at the same time.
